CmdLine: set -x  && : "install xrdp"  && apt-get update  && apt-get install -y        xubuntu-desktop        xrdp        dbus        vim        supervisor  && apt-get clean  && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: set -x  && : "create xrdp user"  && addgroup --gid 999 ubuntu  && useradd -m -u 999 -s /bin/bash -g ubuntu ubuntu  && echo "ubuntu:ubuntu" | chpasswd  && echo "ubuntu    ALL=(ALL) ALL" >> /etc/sudoers
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: set -x  && : "setup xrdp"  && echo "xfce4-session" > /home/ubuntu/.xsession  && echo 'export XDG_SESSION_DESKTOP=xubuntu\nexport XDG_DATA_DIRS=/usr/share/xfce4:/usr/share/xubuntu:/usr/local/share:/usr/share:/var/lib/snapd/desktop:/usr/share\nexport XDG_CONFIG_DIRS=/etc/xdg/xdg-xubuntu:/etc/xdg:/etc/xdg'>> /home/ubuntu/.xsessionrc  && chown ubuntu:ubuntu /home/ubuntu/.xsession  && chown ubuntu:ubuntu /home/ubuntu/.xsessionrc
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine:
set -x  && : "setup supervisord"  && echo "[supervisord]
nodaemon=true
" > /etc/supervisor/conf.d/supervisord.conf  && echo "[program:xrdp]
command=/usr/sbin/xrdp --nodaemon
" >> /etc/supervisor/conf.d/supervisord.conf  && echo "[program:xrdp-sesman]
command=/usr/sbin/xrdp-sesman -n
" >> /etc/supervisor/conf.d/supervisord.conf  && echo "[program:dbus-daemon]
command=/usr/bin/dbus-daemon --system --nofork
user=messagebus
" >> /etc/supervisor/conf.d/supervisord.conf
Commands.Name: run
